blog loke porawal innawa..sahenna porawal poriyawal ganak innawa un ekekwath wiyadam karagena wath ehema nathnam katawath gotta allalawath naththanam bajar eke chandi wage athin payin kata hari anala porawal una un nemeyi un blog loke chandi une thiyena lokuma awiya akuru harba karala..unge liwille rasata kiyona apiyi unwa chandi ehema nathnam porawal kale..eka therum ganna bari wima gana mage kanagatuwa yakata palakarana gaman wena namakin hari liyanna waren kiyanawa..mokada mata uge liwilla rasayi uuta minissu therum ganna bara eka mata adala na uge liwillen mata uu porak..

merata pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyange hingaya labana wasaredi awasan wana bawa rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya pawasayi.pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyange hingakama nisa hediyanta suthikagara puhunuwa labadena lesa illamin heda paripalanaya gena giya ema asathutudayaka thaththwaya aluthin pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyan bandawa ganimath samanga awasan wana bawa sangamaye madhya prakashaka waidya nawin da soyisa mahatha kiya.saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha dun niyogayakata anuwa pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyan 1500 k aluthin puhunu kirimata bandawa gena athi athara idiri masa kihipaya thuladi thawath pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyan 1500 denaku bandawa ganimata piyawara gena athi bawa da ee mahatha pawasuweya.prasawa ha nariweda wisheshagnya waidyawarun jathyanthara pramithiyakata anuwa winnambau puhunuwa labadimata rujuwama sambandha wi athi bawath me puhunuwata wiruddha wimata heda paripalanayata nohaki bawath hethema prakasha kaleya.winnambau matha puhunuwa prasawa ha nariweda wisheshagnya waidyawarunge ruju adhikshanayata anuwa sidu karana athara in mathru sewawe gunathmaka diyunuwak da sidu wana bawa ohu awadharanaya kaleya..
oya puththalame neweyi me lankawe sathara dig bhagaye kohe giyath obathuma wenuwen galana maha janangaga wadi wenawa misak adu wenna.

ek dahawala mama boralle rajya mudrana departhamenthuwata mandak obben athi wanathamullata piwisimata athi athuru parata piwisunemi.ehi relpara hamuwanathuru gos konkrit dama thibu thawath athuru parakata piwisa wadi apahasuwakin thorawama manga salakunu asa 'kantha samupakara mulasthanaya' soyagathimi.themahal godanangille dewana thattuwe thibu karyalaye mama kantha samupakaraye nirmathaෲ ha samanyadhikari nandasiri gamage mahatha munagasunemi.
